title: If You Love Me…
speaker: Matt McCullough
blurb: Jesus teaches that if we love him we will obey him, and if we don’t love him we won’t obey him. The key to our behavior–what we do–is in the affections–what we love. That’s why Jesus’s promise of a Helper, the Holy Spirit, is such good news. The promised Spirit is also a promise of a new heart moved by love for Jesus.
